774313 THE ASSAM CRIMINAL LAW AMENDMENT (SUPPLEMENTARY) ACT, 1934
ACT NO. 27 OF 1934 [ 25th August, 1934.]
An Act to supplement the Assam Criminal Law Amendment Act, 1934.
WHEREAS it is expedient to supplement the Assam Criminal Law Amendment Act, 1934 (Assam 3 of 1934), It is hereby enacted as follows:-
427573 1Short title. This Act may be called the Assam Criminal Law Amendment (Supplementary) Act, 1934.
793891 2
1234573 1Appeals and confirmations. Any person convicted on a trial held by Commissioner under the Assam Criminal Law Amendment Act, 1934 (Assam 3 of 1934), may appeal to the High Court of Judicature at Fort William in Bengal, and such appeal shall be disposed of by the said High Court in the manner provided in Chapter XXXI of the Code of Criminal Procedure, 1898 (5 of 1898).
565669 2When the said Commissioners pass a sentence of death, the record of the proceedings before them shall be submitted to the said High Court, and the sentence shall not be executed unless it is con- firmed by the High Court which shall exercise in respect of such proceedings all the powers conferred on the High Court by Chapter XXVII of the Code of Criminal Procedure, 1898 (5 of 1898).
940804 3Bar of certain legal proceedings. The powers conferred by section 491 of the Code of Criminal Procedure, 1898 (5 of 1898), shall not be exercised in respect of any person arrested, committed to or detained in custody under the Assam Criminal Law Amendment Act, 1934 (Assam 3 of 1934).
1254536 4Retrospective effect of section Sections 2 and 3. section 2 and section 3 shall have effect from the commencement of the Assam Criminal Law Amendment Act, 1934 (Assam 3 of 1934).
